title.value: Biological preparation Stimul as a plant growth regulator
Биопрепарат стимул как регулятор роста растений

journal.title: Vegetable Growing : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Feklistova, I.N., Belarus State Univ., Minsk (Belarus)
Vojtka, D.V., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute of Plant Protection
Lysak, V.V., Belarus State Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there was demonstrated high biological activity of biological preparation Stimul during its applying to glass-grown vegetable crops: addition yield of cucumber (Cucumis sativus) was 16,1%, tomato (Lycopersicon esculentum) -27,4%. There were identified factors which cause effect of biological preparation. Pseudomonas fluorescens S-32 bacteria - base of Stimul preparation - synthesize gibberellins, IAA and pyoverdines which positively stimulate plant growth. The obtained data indicate the prospects of using biological product Stimul in agrobiocenoses to improve health and increase yield of greenhouse crops.
